resume.title: Aspiring Full Stack Developer
resume.description: I am currently enrolled at Life Choices Academy for a course in Web Development.

resume.title: Technical Support Associate
resume.description: Prior to Life Choices I was employed at SA Commercial. A BPO in Cape Town CBD, and was part of their Sage 50C Accounting campaign which focuses on providing technical support to the users of the software.

resume.title: Technical Support Associate
resume.description: My longest employment period was at Amazon. I was initially hired to be part of their retail customer service department but later moved to their digital and device support department. As part of the D2 team, I provided technical support for the users of Amazon devices (ie Alexa and Kindle) and Amazon services (i.e Prime Video and Amazon Music)

about: Veronique Nappie, an aspiring full stack web developer. I would consider myself introverted but highly ambitious. I am not likely to wait for an opportunity to come to me but rather create one and not give up until I achieve what I set out to. I matriculated in 2015 from Sans Souci Girls’ High School. Directly after high school I spent a year tutoring high school students. After tutoring, I started my first job in sales, selling insurance for Vodacom. After giving sales a try I transitioned into a customer service from at Amazon. While at Amazon I spent most of my time in the technical support department. It was around this time I also decided to start my post high school education. I registered for a BSc in Physics and Math at Unisa. During my studies I discovered coding when I registered for a module in C++. I’ve always been drawn to solving problems and finding coding has allowed me to do this while being able to create new things too.

testimonials.name: Thimna
testimonials.quotes: Thimna has an incredible work ethic and takes pride in everything she does. She has demonstrated a lot of skill and I believe she has the ability to be an amazing developer. She has shown that she pays a lot of attention to detail and will do everything to see that her work is meticulous.  I've had the pleasure of working with her as her peer and she is always ready to help wherever she can. In addition she is an incredible communicator and is able to effectively take charge in a group when required to do so. She is clearly very passionate about everything she sets her mind to and will do her best to see that her vision becomes a reality. I truly believe she'll be an invaluable asset to any company she is a part of.

testimonials.name: Vuyiseka
testimonials.quotes: I have had the pleasure of working closely with Veronique the past 2 months, and I am continually impressed by her dedication, skills, and passion for software development. As an aspiring developer, one of her standout qualities is her ability to quickly grasp complex technical concepts and turn them into practical solutions. She has a keen eye for detail, always striving for excellence in her work. I've seen her tackle challenging projects with determination, consistently delivering high-quality code and innovative solutions. She is not only a skilled aspiring programmer but also an excellent collaborator. She communicate effectively, ask insightful questions, and actively participate in discussions, contributing fresh ideas and problem-solving skills. Her willingness to learn and adapt in the fast-paced world of development is truly commendable.

testimonials.name: Ntokozo
testimonials.quotes: Veronique is an very intelligent young lady, her ability to comprehend complex dynamics is phenomenal not only that but her ability to explain complex concepts in the most simplest way is honestly a gift and it has only been an honor being able to work with Veronique. I know for sure that which ever path she chooses, she will succeed.

testimonials.name: Joel
testimonials.quotes: Veronique is a creative, talented, and well-behaved individual who always prioritizes her work. She excels in collaborating with others and has gained proficiency in HTML5, CSS, and Bootstrap. Including Git and GitHub.

testimonials.name: Carl
testimonials.quotes: I've had the pleasure of working closely with Veronique, and let me tell you, she's an absolute gem in the web development world. I've been consistently amazed by her attention to detail and how efficiently she manages her time. She's a real workhorse, and I mean that in the best way possible. But it's not just her technical skills that shine. Veronique's communication and leadership abilities are top-notch. She's always ready to lend a hand to her colleagues, and she's got this knack for quick thinking that's truly impressive. Plus, she's not just a pretty face; she's incredibly sharp. If you're looking for a web developer who goes above and beyond, Veronique is your person. I can't recommend her enough for any web development role.

projects.name: The Book Corner
projects.description: An eCommerce site built using HTML 5, CSS, Javascript, and Bootstrap 5
